com.ecs.utils
Class Cache

java.lang.Object
  com.ecs.utils.Cache
public class Cache
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for adding and retrieving Stellent content items from the ECSBaseUtils Cache. A retrieve automatically triggers a retieve to cache if the item cannot currently be found in the cache.

Author:
Gordon Sandeman

Constructor Detail

Cache

public Cache()
Method Detail

initialise

public static void initialise(boolean logActivity)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
If the Cache is not already initialised this call will instuct the CacheManager to initialise the cache. If running ECSBaseUtils as a Stellent component the Cache will always be initialised on start-up, if running ECSBaseUtils standalone the Cache must be explicitly initialised with this call before it can be used.

Parameters:
logActivity - Flag indicating whether the attempt to log cache activity
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getStaticValue

public static java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream getStaticValue(java.lang.String key)
                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
Utility method for retrieving a Content Item's content from the static cache. Once an item is added to the cache it remains in the cache (and will not be updated) until the Stellent content server is restarted.

Parameters:
key - The Stellent content item contentId
Returns:
ByteArrayOutputStream
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getDynamicValue

public static java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream getDynamicValue(java.lang.String key)
                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
Utility method for retrieving a Content Item's content from the dyanmic cache. This retrieve first checks that the item is not stale and if necessary updates the cache to hold the latest version of the items content.

Parameters:
key - The Stellent content item contentId
Returns:
ByteArrayOutputStream
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getCustomCacheValue

public static java.lang.Object getCustomCacheValue(java.lang.String key,
                                                   java.lang.String cacheName)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
Utility method for retrieving a Content Item's content from a custom cache. This retrieve first checks that the item is not stale and if necessary updates the cache to hold the latest version of the items content. This method should be used when accessing dynamic XML caches.

Parameters:
key - The cache key
Returns:
Object the cache item
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
